properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 8 at 9:29AM MST until February 9 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
...SNOW LATE SATURDAY INTO EARLY SUNDAY...

.The next system will move into the area this afternoon, bringing
snowfall later today and tonight. Snow will taper off Sunday
morning.

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8
inches with locally higher amounts possible.

* WHERE...The Northern Black Hills.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Two periods of snow are expected today and
tonight. Some travel difficulties may arise this afternoon and
evening, but the majority of snow and travel impacts will occur
tonight.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather
conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions.

Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the
5 1 1 app for your state.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY
